2.Pros: Discount food, some great co workers, almost always work

4.Pros: Flexibility with schedule, customer service skills you will gain, at my location the managers were great to work with.

5.Cons: -Always pay as little as they can get away with-Air conditioning was broken. Do you know how hot it is to work fryers when its 25+ outside and the air con is out? Very.

6.Pros: nice people, bad customers, no surprise.
6.Cons: typical fast food and things you'd expect.

7.Pros: A week's paid vacation after you've been there a year but they run their employees off before that year most times
7.Cons: The McDonald's in front of peddlers mall in Richmond KY doesn't appreciate anything you do for them. They just let you do the dirty work while the main managers sit on the office!

8.Cons: Always short handed people, management doesn't care about crew members.

9.Pros: nothing honestly it was pretty bad
